activity.title: coronasafe/care_fe#7411
activity.text:
- [x] the age is not being saved, even after modifying the patient details page
- [x]  When we create a patient with age, and open the update detail page of the patient, you will be seeing DOB as by default selected option 
- [x]  After switching to age, when you try to type "24", the element goes out of once you type 2 
- [x]  the DOB should be in a single line on the responsive view 
- [ ] delete this entire test and modify exist any two cypress test to verify this
- [ ] the rename "age-input-type-selector" to "age-selector" or something short
- [ ] Correct the grammar in the pop-up content, rephrase it as we are talking about the patient here, so we cant use "you"
- [ ]  We are not able to reduce and increase the value using the icon

activity.title: coronasafe/care#1935
activity.text:
@vigneshhari here in the database we store only the age previously in Users model, 
1. Choosing a random value of date of birth is  to save the age of the user as we eliminate the age field after migration 
2. choosing only jan 1 as random dob is because , we can accurately calculate the age if needed , if we choose another date , our age calculated will get inconsistent if the actual date of birth is before the chosen date of birth
Please correct me , if I am wrong
